snippet: A day-by-day journey up I-35 continues in Tulsa, where the nexus between illegal immigration and crime is more complicated than it appears.
abstract: Sheriff's office in Tulsa, Okla, says focusing local law enforcement on illegal immigration makes sense, because department can then more easily round up drug traffickers; city police say most drug dealers and murderers arrested around Tulsa are not immigrants, and they would rather work with immigrants, here legally or not, to encourage them to report crime; conflicting views of two law enforcement departments is at nexus of the issue of immigration and crime.
lead_paragraph: A day-by-day journey up I-35 continues in Tulsa, where the nexus between illegal immigration and crime is more complicated than it appears.

headline.main: Crime, Migrants and Politics Intersect on Tulsa Streets
headline.print_headline: Crime, Migrants and Politics Intersect on Tulsa Streets
